sys_properties.choices: global=Virtual Attachments are enabled on all forms table=Virtual Attachments are only activated on the tables configured by the property x_376096_cxp.virtual_attachments.tables script=Virtual Attachments are only activated on records that the property x_376096_cxp.virtual_attachments.script returns true on formatter=Virtual Attachments are only activated on forms that have included the 'Virtual Attachments' on the form (via Configure > Form Layout)
sys_properties.description: Defines how virtual attachments are enabled on the forms. The property x_376096_cxp.virtual_attachments.enabled acts as a dead man's switch, meaning that if this property is turned off all virtual attachment related script are deactivated instantly.
sys_properties.name: x_376096_cxp.virtual_attachments.mode

sys_update_version.name: sys_properties_d45ac8f697bc11102f77b4b3f153af5f
sys_update_version.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_properties"> <sys_properties action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <choices>global=Virtual Attachments are enabled on all forms table=Virtual Attachments are only activated on the tables configured by the property x_376096_cxp.virtual_attachments.tables script=Virtual Attachments are only activated on records that the property x_376096_cxp.virtual_attachments.script returns true on formatter=Virtual Attachments are only activated on forms that have included the 'Virtual Attachments' on the form (via Configure > Form Layout) </choices> <description>Defines how virtual attachments are enabled on the forms. The property x_376096_cxp.virtual_attachments.enabled acts as a dead man's switch, meaning that if this property is turned off all virtual attachment related script are deactivated instantly.</description> <ignore_cache>true</ignore_cache> <is_private>false</is_private> <name>x_376096_cxp.virtual_attachments.mode</name> <read_roles/> <suffix>virtual_attachments.mode</suffix> <sys_class_name>sys_properties</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-07-23 12:31:43</sys_created_on> <sys_id>d45ac8f697bc11102f77b4b3f153af5f</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>x_376096_cxp.virtual_attachments.mode</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Classic Experience" source="x_376096_cxp">3c8bfe3897ac11102f77b4b3f153af0e</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Classic Experience">3c8bfe3897ac11102f77b4b3f153af0e</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_properties_d45ac8f697bc11102f77b4b3f153af5f</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-07-25 09:35:50</sys_updated_on> <type>choicelist</type> <value>global</value> <write_roles/> </sys_properties> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=d45ac8f697bc11102f77b4b3f153af5f"/> </record_update>
